Topic.Title: Many that commit this sort of act have had their brains fried on various types of dope.

Message.Msg: Be careful my friend. You've lied about my putting certain info on this board. I've never mentioned family names. I may get my friend "Raptor" to track you. (yes Virgina, it can be done) I don't really care whether you are government or someone that's just clever but you keep it up and I'll find you.

Topic.Title: Many that commit this sort of act have had their brains fried on various types of dope.

Message.Msg: Another keyboard tough guy. What are you going to do if you find him? Wet your panties!
excuse me CRACK OHH i do not think soooo....at least u could of said cocaine hahahahahaha lets not get drugs involed PLEASEEE...

Topic.Title: Many that commit this sort of act have had their brains fried on various types of dope.

Message.Msg: Oh Terrel Eddy, you squawking no account little capon. You don't need to send "Raptor" or any of your other imaginary friends after me. I have told you repeatedly on this board over the last week exactly where to find me and exactly when. Stand up or shut up you #$%$ lickspittle. On second thought, since you never have stood up and don't know how to do it just Shut Up! Crawl back into whatever foul hole that belched you forth! Your lack of intelligence is simply astounding. You posted all of the information I have using your teenage girly "My Life" account, tying your name, street address, Yahoo ID and names of family members to it. It takes about 45 seconds to find. It's public information because YOU put it out there! As if that was not stupid enough, your impotently threatening little post just confirmed that the information is correct. Though I'm sure Marjorie and Robert have long known you are a fool, can you imagine how much you would disappoint them AGAIN if they found out that you were tying their names to your nonsense on the internet? "Jew watch", "My Big Brother", your racism, and your sick violent lies and delusions...You are pitiful. Who let's you play with the computer anyway? Your dementia day care worker should keep a closer eye on you and not let you play with anything more complicated than your large print editions of "Rubelations". Idiot!

Topic.Title: Many that commit this sort of act have had their brains fried on various types of dope.

Message.Msg: The poor little thing cannot even figure out how to keep his own basic information confidential. A "My Life" account. Really? Because all of the people who no longer have anything to do with him are just dying to use them interwebs to get back into contact with good ol' Terrel, the wanna be violent, racist, Revelations-quoting #$%$. HAHAHAHAH...Oh Terrel, you so crazy!
